00032 // Templates for relational operations.

00036 #ifndef _operators_h
00037 #define _operators_h
00038 
00039 #include <Regex.h>      // GNU Regex class used for string =~ op.
00040 
00041 static unsigned
00042 dods_max(int i1, int i2)
00043 {
00044     return (unsigned)((i1 > i2) ? i1 : i2);
00045 }
00046 
00054 template<class T1, class T2> class Cmp {
00055  public:
00056     static bool eq(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 == v2;}
00057     static bool ne(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 != v2;}
00058     static bool gr(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 > v2;}
00059     static bool ge(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 >= v2;}
00060     static bool lt(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 < v2;}
00061     static bool le(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 <= v2;}
00062     static bool re(T1 v1, T2 v2) {
00063     cerr << "Illegal operation" << endl;
00064     return false;
00065     }
00066 };
00067 
00076 template<class UT1, class T2> class USCmp {
00077  public:
00078     static bool eq(UT1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 == dods_max(0, v2);}
00079     static bool ne(UT1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 != dods_max(0, v2);}
00080     static bool gr(UT1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 > dods_max(0, v2);}
00081     static bool ge(UT1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 >= dods_max(0, v2);}
00082     static bool lt(UT1 v1, T2 v2) {
00083     return v1 < dods_max(0, v2);
00084     }
00085     static bool le(UT1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 <= dods_max(0, v2);}
00086     static bool re(UT1 v1, T2 v2) {
00087     cerr << "Illegal operation" << endl;
00088     return false;
00089     }
00090 };
00091 
00104 template<class T1, class UT2> class SUCmp {
00105  public:
00106     static bool eq(T1 v1, UT2 v2) {return dods_max(0, v1) == v2;}
00107     static bool ne(T1 v1, UT2 v2) {return dods_max(0, v1) != v2;}
00108     static bool gr(T1 v1, UT2 v2) {return dods_max(0, v1) > v2;}
00109     static bool ge(T1 v1, UT2 v2) {return dods_max(0, v1) >= v2;}
00110     static bool lt(T1 v1, UT2 v2) {return dods_max(0, v1) < v2;}
00111     static bool le(T1 v1, UT2 v2) {return dods_max(0, v1) <= v2;}
00112     static bool re(T1 v1, UT2 v2) {
00113     cerr << "Illegal operation" << endl;
00114     return false;
00115     }
00116 };
00117 
00123 template<class T1, class T2> class StrCmp {
00124  public:
00125     static bool eq(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 == v2;}
00126     static bool ne(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 != v2;}
00127     static bool gr(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 > v2;}
00128     static bool ge(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 >= v2;}
00129     static bool lt(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 < v2;}
00130     static bool le(T1 v1, T2 v2) {return v1 <= v2;}
00131     static bool re(T1 v1, T2 v2) {
00132     Regex r(v2.c_str());
00133     return r.match(v1.c_str(), v1.length()) > 0;
00134     }
00135 };
00136 
00164 template<class T1, class T2, class C>
00165 bool rops(T1 a, T2 b, int op)
00166 {
00167     switch (op) {
00168       case SCAN_EQUAL:
00169     return C::eq(a, b);
00170       case SCAN_NOT_EQUAL:
00171     return C::ne(a, b);
00172       case SCAN_GREATER:
00173     return C::gr(a, b);
00174       case SCAN_GREATER_EQL:
00175     return C::ge(a, b);
00176       case SCAN_LESS:
00177     return C::lt(a, b);
00178       case SCAN_LESS_EQL:
00179     return C::le(a, b);
00180       case SCAN_REGEXP:
00181     return C::re(a, b);
00182       default:
00183     cerr << "Unknown operator" << endl;
00184     return false;
00185     }
00186 }
